review: Best purchase I've ever made hands down. Awesome streaming for a great price! Not to mention you can take your fire stick anywhere with you! I love it and I'll be buying more for holiday gifts! Fast streaming as well as a quick and easy setup. Highly recommended if you love to stream movies, music, games, and more! So much to choose from especially if you're a prime member. Definitely a good buy.
